docs.snippet: The Chicago Cubs are coming off their worst two-year stretch, but Theo Epstein, the president of baseball operations, and his legacy in Boston offers hope....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs are coming off their worst two-year stretch, but Theo Epstein, the president of baseball operations, and his legacy in Boston offers hope.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column holds that while Chicago Cubs are coming off their worst two-year stretch, Theo Epstein, president of baseball operations with a legacy in Boston, offers the team and its fans hope.

headline.main: Cubs Are Working on Winning Soon, if Not Now
headline.print_headline: Cubs Are Working on Winning Soon, if Not Now

docs.snippet: The pitcher was found to have “no shoulder problems at all” after an M.R.I. exam on Thursday, Manager Terry Collins said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The pitcher was found to have “no shoulder problems at all” after an M.R.I. exam on Thursday, Manager Terry Collins said.
docs.abstract: Magnetic resonance imaging test performed on New York Mets pitcher Jon Niese following his complaints of shoulder pain find no problems; team officials had expressed concern given Niese's experience with partly torn rotator cuff that took him out of rotation for about seven weeks during 2013 season.

headline.main: Exam Finds No Shoulder Problem for Mets’ Jon Niese
headline.print_headline: Niese Gets Good News on Shoulder

docs.snippet: The Mets’ efforts to trade Ike Davis in the off-season were unsuccessful, so he and Lucas Duda will compete to start at first base....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Mets’ efforts to trade Ike Davis in the off-season were unsuccessful, so he and Lucas Duda will compete to start at first base.
docs.abstract: New York Mets' efforts to trade Ike Davis in off-season were unsuccessful, so he and Lucas Duda will compete to start at first base; whoever wins the job will be expected to provide left-handed power this season somewhere near the middle of the batting order.

headline.main: More Seems to Be Less for Mets at First Base
headline.print_headline: More Seems to Be Less for Mets at First Base

docs.snippet: A minor leaguer in the San Francisco Giants’ organization, second baseman Ryan Jones, was suspended for 50 games after testing positive for an amphetamine....
docs.lead_paragraph: A minor leaguer in the San Francisco Giants’ organization, second baseman Ryan Jones, was suspended for 50 games after testing positive for an amphetamine.

docs.snippet: Derek Jeter was hitless in his first spring training game of the year, but his ankle did not noticeably slow him, and neither did his calf or his quad....
docs.lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter was hitless in his first spring training game of the year, but his ankle did not noticeably slow him, and neither did his calf or his quad.
docs.abstract: New York Mets shortstop Derek Jeter is hitless in his first spring training game of the year, but his ankle did not noticeably slow him, and neither did his calf or quad; Jeter, who spent this off-season conditioning his legs so they would not give way as they did last year, says he feels better than he has since 2012, when he was bothered by foot problems for weeks before his ankle broke.

headline.main: Jeter, Held Hitless, Gives Yankees Fans Reason to Celebrate
headline.print_headline: Jeter, Held Hitless, Gives Yankees Fans Reason to Celebrate

headline.print_headline: Cervelli and Yankees Teammates Show Support for Protesters in Venezuela

docs.snippet: San Francisco's Madison Bumgarner allowed one hit in two scoreless innings in his first spring training outing as he prepares for a his first opening-day start, and a San Francisco Giants' split squad defeated the Milwaukee Brewers 4-3 Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: San Francisco's Madison Bumgarner allowed one hit in two scoreless innings in his first spring training outing as he prepares for a his first opening-day start, and a San Francisco Giants' split squad defeated the Milwaukee Brewers 4-3 Friday.

headline.main: Bumgarner 2 Scoreless IP; Giants Beat Brewers 4-3
